comment.body: I guess it is nice to give apple a good 300% prophet on there pc hardware with just two proprietary chips running a candy covered bsd system. If you did your homework you could have saved allot of money and gotten better hardware minus the genous apple support that always points to hardware upgrades. Usually the first year is fine with apple products after that they will just screw you to buy another new product.

What did you pay for the Mac mini? 
I do agree that out of the box computers usually run better than a build your own system. However you learn more about the operating system with a build your own system.
